class.name: IsisMgsMocNarrowAngleCamera
class.brief: Camera model for MGS/MOC Narrow Angle
class.description: This class handles the camera model for the MGS/MOC narrow angle instrument. To create an IsisMocNarrowAngle camera object use the IsisCameraManager class and invoke the Camera method passing in a moc na cube.

function.name: IsisMgsMocNarrowAngleCamera
function.description: Constructs a camera model for the MGS MOC narrow angle camera

argument.name: lab
argument.description: A PVL object containing valid MGS MOC narrow angle labels
